USA: Esopus Wars: The first war took place.
Spain: The Peace of the Pyrenees was signed.
Peru: Bohórquez led the Calchaqui in an uprising against the Spanish crown.
India: Shivaji's ill-equipped and small Maratha army defeat numerically much larger Adilshahi troops at the Battle of Pratapgarh marking the first victory of the Maratha Empire. Shivaji personally kills Adilshahi commander Afzal Khan (general).
France: Franco-Spanish War: Victorious France signs the Treaty of the Pyrenees with Spain and annexes northern Catalonia and French Flanders. The war confirms France as the dominant continental power and Bourbon strength over the Habsburgs.
England: Second Commonwealth a period of great political instability
China: Jesuits Martino Martini and Ferdinand Verbiest arrived in China.
